text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes it's me bob...
Join me for learning street with bob..
Hello kids!
Do you know there are lower case versions of all the letters of the alphabet?
Let’s take a look at them!”
They are the small letters Some look thinner some look fatter
Some are shorter than capitals But they’re all fit as fiddles

See you soon with Bob the Train!”
